alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Jasper; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:23AM CDT until June 29 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lawrence County in southeastern Illinois... Crawford County in east central Illinois... Southeastern Jasper County in southeastern Illinois... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 523 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willow Hill, or 9 miles east of Newton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hardinville around 540 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Robinson, New Hebron, Flat Rock, Birds, Palestine and Russellville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
